StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateRemarkUsingGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@RemarkID uniqueiden..er, @SchoolCode uniqueiden..er, @FiscalYear int, @Remark varchar(100), @UserLogin varchar(50)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @CollegePro.leID uniqueiden..er Select @CollegePro.leID = CollegePro.leID FROM [USMC].CollegePro.le cp inner join [dbo].High_School hs on cp.SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE where hs.RowGuid = @SchoolCode and FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
--IMPORTANT NOTE: Add begin and end transac.on
IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].[Remark] where RemarkID = @RemarkID and @RemarkID IS NOT NULL) -- then update the exisi.ng record BEGIN
UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[Remark] SET
Remark = @Remark, UserLogin = @UserLogin where RemarkID = @RemarkID
END
--- ELSE PROCEED WITH INSERT ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[Remark] ([RemarkID],[Remark],[En.tyID],[En.tyTypeID],[CollegePro.leID],[UserLogin],[UpdateDate] )
VALUES (@RemarkID,@Remark, 3,3, @CollegePro.leID,@UserLogin, GetDate())
END --- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
